dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: Welcome to the game! I'm a brave adventurer, seeking fortune and glory in these lands.

dialogues.speaker: Villain
dialogues.text: Foolish mortal, you think you can defeat me? My army is vast and my powers are great!

dialogues.speaker: Protagonist
dialogues.text: We'll see about that! I've been preparing for this moment my whole life. Let's get started!

dialogues.speaker: Villain
dialogues.text: Very well, let us begin. But be warned, mortal, you will not leave this place alive...
